segment.source: Export an AppLocker policy to an XML file (Windows 10)
segment.target: Export an AppLocker policy to an XML file (Windows 10)

segment.source: This topic for IT professionals describes the steps to export an AppLocker policy to an XML file for review or testing.
segment.target: This topic for IT professionals describes the steps to export an AppLocker policy to an XML file for review or testing.

segment.source: Export an AppLocker policy to an XML file
segment.target: Export an AppLocker policy to an XML file

segment.source: This topic for IT professionals describes the steps to export an AppLocker policy to an XML file for review or testing.
segment.target: This topic for IT professionals describes the steps to export an AppLocker policy to an XML file for review or testing.

segment.source: Membership in the local Administrators group, or equivalent, is the minimum required to complete this procedure.
segment.target: Membership in the local Administrators group, or equivalent, is the minimum required to complete this procedure.

segment.source: To export an AppLocker policy to an XML file
segment.target: To export an AppLocker policy to an XML file

segment.source: From the AppLocker console, right-click AppLocker, and then click Export Policy.
segment.target: From the AppLocker console, right-click AppLocker, and then click Export Policy.

segment.source: Browse to the location where you want to save the XML file.
segment.target: Browse to the location where you want to save the XML file.

segment.source: In the File name box, type a file name for the XML file, and then click Save.
segment.target: In the File name box, type a file name for the XML file, and then click Save.
